amendment.description: To appropriate $1, 047,000,000 for procurement for the National Guard and Reserves.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 452 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 116.
Amendment SA 452 proposed by Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S4590-4591, S4687-4690; text: CR S4687) To appropriate $1, 047,000,000 for procurement for the National Guard and Reserves.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 452 proposed by Senator Landrieu.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 452 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 116.
